code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'../api/axiosConfig';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'../App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ExitForm=()=>{const[personId,setPersonId]=useState('');const[gate,setGate]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();try{await axios.post('/exit',{personId,gate});setPersonId('');setGate('');alert('Exit successful');}catch(error){console.error('Error registering exit:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Exit Form"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Person ID",value:personId,onChange:e=>setPersonId(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Gate",value:gate,onChange:e=>setGate(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Exit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"home-button",onClick:()=>navigate('/'),children:"Home"})]})]})]});};export default ExitForm;
